duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and empower executive assistants to perform in a manner that best supports and meets the needs of the executive team.
Plan, direct, and review the work plan for assigned executive services staff, including assigning work activities and evaluating work products.
Manage, coordinate, and monitor administrative activities to ensure efficient, consistent, and quality outcomes and exceptional support to internal and external customers.
Oversee the scheduling of executives’ calendars, and coordinate appointments, meetings, and speaking engagements.
Provide administrative analysis for special projects, conduct research, and prepare detailed reports including recommendations and implementation strategies.
Complete other projects and duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree required. Bachelor’s degree preferred.
